com.ikueb.wallclock

Class FixedAlarmClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.time.Clock
      • com.ikueb.wallclock.AbstractFixedWallClock
        • com.ikueb.wallclock.FixedAlarmClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlarmFixedWallClock, FixedWallClock, WallClock, java.io.Serializable

    public final class FixedAlarmClock
extends AbstractFixedWallClock
implements AlarmFixedWallClock, java.io.Serializable
    A mutable WallClock implementation that provides a fixed instant.
    Both dates and times are settable.
    See Also:
    AbstractFixedWallClock, Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        zoneId - the time-zone to use, not null

      • alarm

        public void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: AlarmFixedWallClock
        Registers a listener for all updates.
        This will be overridden if a more specific date and/or time is given.
        Specified by:
        alarm in interface AlarmFixedWallClock
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register for all updates

      • alarm

        public void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener,
                  java.time.LocalDate dateToAlarm)
        Description copied from interface: AlarmFixedWallClock
        Registers a listener for all updates happening on that date.
        This overrides the 'all updates' specification.
        Specified by:
        alarm in interface AlarmFixedWallClock
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        dateToAlarm - the date to alarm for all updates at the date

      • snooze

        public void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener,
                   java.time.LocalDate dateToSnooze)
        Description copied from interface: AlarmFixedWallClock
        Unregisters a listener for all updates at the date.
        If this is the last alarm to be unregistered, the listener is effectively unregistered for all updates.
        Specified by:
        snooze in interface AlarmFixedWallClock
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        dateToSnooze - the date to snooze for all updates at the date

      • snooze

        Unregisters a listener for all updates at the time.
        If this is the last alarm to be unregistered, the listener is effectively unregistered for all updates.
        Specified by:
        snooze in interface AlarmFixedWallClock
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        timeToSnooze - the time to snooze for all updates at the time
